ygData.subject: Re: ROBES
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is my rundown of known robe colors.... Freeport - Violet Robes Felwithe - Green Robes Neriak - Black Robes Ak anon - Yellow Robes Qeynos - Blue Robes
ygData.messageBody:
Here is my rundown of known robe colors....

Freeport - Violet Robes
Felwithe - Green Robes
Neriak - Black Robes
Ak'anon - Yellow Robes
Qeynos - Blue Robes
Befallen 3rd Level - Gossamer Robes(white)
Erudin - I believe it is Red but I can't be sure.

Any other additions would be appreciated.

-----Original Message-----
From: Larimus La'shain [mailto:larimus@...]
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:11 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: ROBES

From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>

You'll find the red robe in the Tower of the Crimson Hands
inside the
Erudin Palace.

Larimus La'shain


>From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>Reply-To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
>To: "EQ WIZARDS" <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eq_wizards] ROBES
>Date: Wed, 21 Apr 1999 10:01:20 -0400
>
>I know people already talked about the clothing thing, but
can
someone give a breakdown of what color robes can be found
where??
>
>SO far all I know is:
>
>Felwithe (high elf city in Greater F.) GREEN ROBE (Sr.
Apprentice
Robe too)
>Gnome city in Steamfont??? YELLOW ROBE (Sr. version?)
>
>I was specifically looking for a RED ROBE or BLACK ROBE . .
.
>
>Thanks!!!
>
>-Mata 9th lvl High Elf Wizard (Eci)
